title: Flash Memory Toolkit v1.20 Portable.
description:
Flash Memory Toolkit v1.20 made Portable

Here you can find all infos:
 <a href="
http://www.flashmemorytoolkit.com/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.flashmemorytoolkit.com/</a>


Flash Memory Toolkit combines a wide range of functions which allows you to get the most out of your flash memory card or USB stick. Measure the performance, scan for errors, securely delete all data, recover files and create a bit-for-bit identical backup with a quick and easy to use interface.


Info
The Info function shows various interesting information such as detailed device capacity, file system, operating system and USB configuration. 

Error Scan
A fast but reliable function to check the integrity of the device by performing a read or write surface scan. 

Eraser
The memory device can be completely erased (wiped) or it can be erased quickly. 

File Recovery
Quickly and effectively recover files which were lost after a format, hardware failure or an accidental deletion. Many file types are supported.

Backup/restore
In only a few minutes you can make a full backup of your memory device. 

Low-level benchmark
Measure the read and write performance. 

File benchmark
Measure how long it will take to read or write files of various lengths to the device.




The Package contains a first version of the program made portable w/ the batch file that launches the program converted to an EXE with QBFC to avoid showing the relative DOS window, but that some AVs see sometimes as a virus. If your AV is one of them, or if you don&#039;t trust too much to it, use the second one that runs directly the batch file. You will have the sloppy DOS window in the background but less complaints from antiviruses...


Enjoy and remember to seed... :o)
